author: Charlotte Gilman
message: Let us revere, let us worship, but erect and open-eyed, the highest, not the lowest; the future, not the past!
title: Thought of the day

author: Mother Teresa
message: Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing.
title: Thought of the day

author: Margaret Runbeck
message: Silences make the real conversations between friends. Not the saying but the never needing to say is what counts.
title: Thought of the day

author: Dalai Lama
message: The key to transforming our hearts and minds is to have an understanding of how our thoughts and emotions work.
title: Thought of the day
